    • Method Detail

      • validateAndFormatCommand

        public static java.lang.String validateAndFormatCommand(Protocol.ProtocolCommand protocolCommand,
                                                        java.lang.String... args)
                                                 throws Protocol.MalformedCommandException
        Validate and format the specified ProtocolCommand with the specified arguments.
        Parameters:
        protocolCommand - the ProtocolCommand.
        args - the arguments, a comma-separated list of String arguments.
        Returns:
        the command as a String, ready to send over a Peer to Peer connection.
        Throws:
        Protocol.MalformedCommandException - thrown if the specified arguments are not conform the protocol.

      • isValidDimension

        public static boolean isValidDimension(int dimension)
        Check if the specified dimension is valid conform protocol.
        Parameters:
        dimension - the dimension.
        Returns:
        true if valid; false otherwise.
